fields.description: Used as the title for this page when included in a list, like the section shortcode.
fields.name: linktitle
fields.title: Link Title

fields.description: Displayed when paginated or in a list and as page description
fields.name: summary
fields.title: Summary

fields.description: Determines order for pages; lower weight first
fields.name: weight
fields.title: Weight

fields.description: These options override site-wide settings for this page. Don't specify a value if you want to inherit the site defaults.
Use this setting to specify whether the page title should be rendered as an <h1> element instead of the default <strong> element.
fields.name: title_as_heading
fields.title: Render Page Title as Heading

fields.description: Specifies whether to render the table of contents for the page. This setting overrides the site's display.table_of_contents.render, if set.
fields.name: render
fields.title: Render the Table of Contents

fields.description: Specify the minimum heading level to include in the page's table of contents, overriding the site's display.table_of_contents.minimum_level setting. This value only affects the table of contents when use_built_in is set to false.
fields.name: minimum_level
fields.title: Minimum Heading Level

fields.description: Specify the maximum heading level to include in the page's table of contents, overriding the site's display.table_of_contents.maximum_level setting. This value only affects the table of contents when use_built_in is set to false.
fields.name: maximum_level
fields.title: Maximum Heading Level

fields.description: Choose whether to use Hugo's builtin table of contents or generate them with Platen, overriding the site's configuration for this page. This overrides the site's display.table_of_contents.use_built_in setting.
fields.name: use_built_in
fields.title: Use Built-In

fields.description: Specify whether the table of contents should render its entries in an ordered list with numerals before each item. By default, the table of contents is rendered in an unordered list without any list markers, only with indents. This value overrides the site's display.table_of_contents.ordered_list setting.
fields.name: ordered_list
fields.title: As Ordered List

fields.description: Applicable to section pages (_index.md) only. Causes this section to display as a flat list without indenting.
fields.name: flatten_section
fields.title: Flatten section in site menu

fields.description: Applicable to section pages (_index.md) only. Causes this section to display as a collapsible entry. When collapsed, child pages are hidden.
fields.name: collapse_section
fields.title: Collapse section in site menu

fields.description: Specifies whether to remove the page from the site menu. This setting only has an effect when the page would otherwise be included in the site menu because it is in the folder defined in the site's display.menu_root_section setting.
fields.name: hide
fields.title: Hide from site menu

fields.description: Specifies whether to enable comments on the page, overriding the site's features.comments.enabled setting for this page.
fields.name: enable_comments
fields.title: Enable comments

fields.description: Specifies whether to exclude the page from site search results. This setting is only effective when the site's features.search.enabled setting is set to true.
fields.name: exclude_from_search
fields.title: Exclude from site search

fields.description: These options override site-wide settings for this page's markup. Don't specify a value if you want to inherit the site defaults.
Defines optional settings for overriding site configuration for the KaTeX markup option, which enables you to use KaTeX markup in your content.
Specifies whether this content should always load the KaTeX style and script modules and auto-render any valid KaTeX markup, even outside of codeblocks and inline images.
fields.name: always_load
fields.title: Always Load KaTeX

fields.name: katex
fields.title: KaTeX

fields.description: Defines optional settings for overriding site configuration for the Mermaid diagrams markup, which enables you to use Mermaid to create diagrams in your content

Specifies the version of Mermaid to load when needed, overriding the site-level setting. Platen retrieves the style and script modules for Mermaid from a CDN at build time. This value is used to determine which version to bundle and use for this content. You can set this value to any valid released version of Mermaid.
fields.name: version
fields.title: Mermaid Version

fields.name: markup
fields.title: Mermaid

fields.name: markup
fields.title: Markup

fields.name: platen
fields.title: Platen
